text:
Ich muss hier mal was loswerden:

Es ist unfassbar wie gut dieser Song ist. Ich habe noch nie über soooo einen langen Zeitraum einen Song rauf und runter gehört!
Bald sind es drei Monate her, dass dieses Lied rauskam. Und ich hör es TAG für TAG und das MEHRFACH.
Das ist ein verdammtes Meisterwerk und von daher echt RESPEKT für so eine Leistung.
Vorallem ist da auch so ein Herz und Gefühl dabei und ist nicht einfach so ein hingerotzter Song wie bei 99% der anderen Rapper.
Das ist wirklich ein Lied der Kategorie "Selbst meine Hater hören den Song rauf und runter".

text: I remember as a child, my older sister showed me this to make me happy when my parents were arguing to tell me to be strong. I can't describe how much memory this song holds and how much i love my sister. Every time i listen to this it fills me up with hope. Us, humans all have different stories and different hopes and dreams. We are like the infinite number of stars in the universe. Trough the history, many people and many dreams came and left. In this life the important thing is to know that we all worth something and we all have to love and respect eachother. As a child i wasn't aware of the brutal truth about reality  and always thought that the world and people as a whole were always happy and celebrating. This song gives me a lot of nostalgia of the times where i was innocent and loving. Now i grown up to be one of the people who hates everything and don't even want to live. But still, the child inside of me still wants and hopes that one day every war and problems will vanish and we will allways celebrate and have fun like life is a festival and i'll always gonna wait for the day that everyone is a whole. I want to visit different countries and know different people with their own unique story and be friend with them. I want to live a life that is full of adventures and memories that ill remember after i die. Thank you for this amazing song Katy Perry <3s

text: Well, Monday July 24th is coming. The first practice for the defending Class AAA Champs. 49-5 in 2022 what will it be in 2023? Stay tuned beginning August 14th. Will they embrace the defense or run from it? Coach Amy McGowan the ACC Legend knows about winning championships at every level. She has the talent but will they come together or rest on their laurels. The coaching staff can coach them up and get them ready but it is up to them. The fans want it but do the coaches and players? Stay tuned Class AAA, there are plenty of challengers one in Murfreesboro told me her goal was to win the region in 2023. I know why this coach doesn't want to go to Blue Raider Arena because that is where dreams go to die.

text: I lost my guitar playing, hard working, life of the party, bright, creative, lovable grandad on July 4th right as the fireworks started bursting. I used to find this song cliche and annoying, I can’t get enough of it today. His daughters and I are getting matching tattoos to replicate his favorite: he has a shooting star bursting through clouds on his arm
